thread.title: Kylie Jenner and Tyga step out for Valentine's Day in NYC
thread.title_full: Kylie Jenner and Tyga step out for Valentine's Day in NYC

title: Kylie Jenner and Tyga step out for Valentine's Day in NYC
text: Share this article Share She kept warm in the cold New York air with a bright red fur coat that came almost down to her ankles, which she wore around her shoulders. The young entrepreneur looked happy to be standing next to her beau on the romantic holiday as she took a photo of the two of them together in an elevator. Young love! The young entrepreneur looked happy to be standing next to her beau on the romantic holiday as she took a photo of the two of them together in an elevator Kylie appeared to wear her dark locks natural and sleek in a short lob around her face. Always ready for the cameras, her makeup looked flawless as the duo got out of their black van and returned to their hotel. The reality star, who is in New York for Fashion Week, spent Monday night sitting front row next to Madonnna at Phillipp Plein show. NYFW: The reality star, who is in New York for Fashion Week, spent Monday night sitting front row next to Madonnna at Phillipp Plein show Tyga also accompanied her to the show Monday night, but it appeared the two decided to do a little sightseeing during the day on Tuesday. Tyga kept things casual for their day out with stripped black pants and a racing-inspired Repsol jacket. He wore a basic white tee under the busy overcoat and paired the entire look with black and white tennis shoes. Tyga kept things casual for their day out with stripped black pants and a racing-inspired Repsol jacket The rapper, who has been spending a lot of time with the Kardashian clan lately, finished off his outfit with a NY baseball cap and dark sunglasses. He was blinged out with accessories around his neck and wrists. The reality star showed off multiple bouquets of flowers she received for Valentine's Day, including a bouquet of gorgeous red long stemmed roses and a pink bouquet shaped as a heart. Earlier, Kylie and Tyga had paid a visit to the Keeping up With The Kardashians star's pop up store in the Soho neighborhood. She's festive! She kept warm in the cold New York air with a bright red fur coat that came almost down to her ankles, which she wore around her shoulders Kylie posed with some of her and sister Kendall's clothing line set out on hangers underneath giant neon signs of her name. Tyga also shared a pic of the two of them on his Instagram to celebrate the venture. But it was Kylie's sister Kim who really showed her appreciation for the new venture. The reality star admitted in a tweet that she had stolen a bunch of Kylie's lip kits and were giving them to fans in the pop up shop. Roses! Kylie got a bouquet of gorgeous red roses to celebrate Valentine's Day Special day: The reality star received Valentine's Day flowers in the shape of a heart Kim documented her sneaky antics on Snapchat showing herself stealing the lip kits from the back of the store to give out to fans. Kylie's older sister than went to the front of the store and made the day of some very grateful fans by giving out samples of the kits. She admitted to her devious ways on Twitter: 'So I went to Kylie's pop up shop today, stole lip kits &gave them out to everyone in the store for Valentine's!She hasn't mentioned it yet,' she tweeted. Devious! Kim posted a Snapchat video stealing Kylie lip kits to give out to fans Happy fans: Kylie's older sister than went to the front of the store and made the day of some very grateful fans by giving out samples of the kits Smiling with joy! The many people in the store were thrilled to meet the reality star and get a free gift The 19-year-old met with a team of people, who showed her around the pop-up shop. One wall featured 5500 lip kits, according to the reality star. The shop, located on 27 Mercer St. in NYC, will be open from 10 am-9pm daily beginning Monday and will remain open until all items are sold. Supportive! The popup shop included Kylie's name in glowing lights Lots to choose from: The shop will be open until all the products are sold out
